name: Skyward Heroes
description:
InDev version of Skyward Heroes.  Visit the blog for more info and in-depth devlogs.
(Better with a joystick)

Controls:

  • WASD / Analog Stick to Move.
  • G / Square to Basic Attack.
  • Space / Triangle to Jump.
  • K / Select for Map.
  • T/ R1 to use Skill 1.
  • Y/ L1 to use Skill 2.
  • U / R2 to use Skill 3.
  • I/ L2 to use Skill 4.

Heroes available: 

  • Bran
  • Sagara
  • Pyrelle
  • Cevil
  • Pio
  • Hask
  • Rot

Areas Available:

  • Test Arena
  • Tutorial
  • Generated Dungeons

Enemies Available:

  • Nibble Mushroom
  • Murder Hornet
  • Crystal Bug
  • Hydra Plant
  • Angry Bat
  • Toothed Flower
  • Ember
  • Muncher
  • Towers
  • Dummies

-Patch notes-
16/07/2020:

  • Added Killplane;
  • Added Respawn;
  • Added Controls Screen (disabled);
  • Adjusted Toothedflower melee range;
  • Changed Control Scheme for Player 1 on keyboard;
  • Fixed faulty player ground detection;
  • Raised thorn gate collider;
  • Changed BacklashBarrier duration and effect;
  • Added hit knockback and visuals for monsters;
  • Raised corpse time for monsters;
